name: SantaClausPoops
0:
”Alexa, ask Santa Claus Poops to play me a poop poem.”
”Alexa, ask Santa Claus Poops to play me a song.”
”Alexa, ask Santa Claus Poops to start.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa claus poops
des:
Enjoy an array of popular holiday music remixed with poop-filled humor and read by Alexa. This is sure to bring a smile to the face of anyone that still finds potty humor funny. 

No curse words, kid safe, no religious songs, just good-natured fun with poop.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
